snippet: The United States and several allies warned President Bashar al-Assad that he would be “held accountable” if his forces used the weapons against the rebels.
abstract: Syria's movement of chemical weapons prompts United States and several allies to repeat their warning to PresBashar al-Assad that he will be held accountable if his forces use the weapons against rebels.

byline.original: By DAVID E. SANGER and ERIC SCHMITT

lead_paragraph: The United States and several allies warned President Bashar al-Assad that he would be “held accountable” if his forces used the weapons against the rebels.

headline.seo: Syria Moves Its Chemical Weapons and Gets Another Warning
headline.main: Syria Moves Its Chemical Weapons, and U.S. and Allies Cautiously Take Note
headline.print_headline: Syria Moves Its Chemical Weapons, and U.S. and Allies Cautiously Take Note

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
